description: This course provides practical experiences and insights for students desiring to explore
career opportunities in the many facets of education. Students, primarily sophomores, live
off-campus, participating in different observational and practical experiences in schools of
their choice. First-year students with special circumstances should consult Education
Department chair. Applications due early in Fall Semester. Offered during Interim.
fullname: Perspectives on Teaching (off-campus: student's choice of setting)
